CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of our results , one can be concluded that the DSeBT placement for construction of donor (D)-acceptor ( A ) polymers is an easy and effective way to realize both the higher J SC and V OC values in PSCs , as a consequence of the selective lower - lying lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) with the HOMO being almost unchanged , together with the effective broadening on the absorption band .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| DSeBT |
| Donor (D) - acceptor (A) polymers |
| PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) |
| LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| DSeBT |
| Donor (D) - acceptor (A) polymers |
| Perovskite Solar Cells (PSCs) |
